net.dean.jraw.http

Class RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.okhttp.Request.Builder
      • net.dean.jraw.http.RequestBuilder

  • public class RequestBuilder
extends com.squareup.okhttp.Request.Builder
    This class extends Request.Builder to provide some Reddit-specific features.

      • query

        public RequestBuilder query(java.lang.Object... args)
        Sets the query string arguments. The given parameters are passed into JrawUtils.args(Object...) and then given to query(java.util.Map).
        Parameters:
        args - The parameters that will be found in the query string
        Returns:
        This RequestBuilder

      • endpoint

        public RequestBuilder endpoint(Endpoints e,
                               java.lang.String... positionalUrlParams)
        Sets the endpoint to use. If the given endpoint has arguments in the URI (such as /user/{username}/about.json), then the given strings will be substituted in the order given. For example, if the endpoint was /api/multi/{multipath}/r/{srname}, and the given strings were "myMulti" and "mySubreddit", then the result would be /api/multipath/myMulti/mySubreddit. If path(String) is also called, this method will take priority, regardless of order.
        Parameters:
        e - The endpoint to use
        positionalUrlParams - The parameters to use. Must be equal to the size of the corresponding Endpoint's Endpoint.getUrlParams() list.
        Returns:
        This RequestBuilder

      • path

        public RequestBuilder path(java.lang.String path)
        Sets the path of the request. For example, "/stylesheet". If endpoint(net.dean.jraw.Endpoints, String...) is also called, that method will take priority, regardless of order.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to use
        Returns:
        This RequestBuilder

      • host

        public RequestBuilder host(java.lang.String host)
        Sets the request's host. For example, "www.reddit.com"
        Parameters:
        host - The new host
        Returns:
        This RequestBuilder
